org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema
Class AeAbstractTZBasedSchemaType

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeAbstractPatternBasedSchemaType
      org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeAbstractTZBasedSchemaType
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeSchemaType
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeSchemaDateTime, AeSchemaDay, AeSchemaMonth, AeSchemaMonthDay, AeSchemaYear, AeSchemaYearMonth
public abstract class AeAbstractTZBasedSchemaType
extends AeAbstractPatternBasedSchemaType

A base class for time-based schema types (types that have a Timezone component).

          The Timezone.

createTimeZone

protected java.util.TimeZone createTimeZone(java.lang.String aTZHours,
                                            java.lang.String aTZMinutes,
                                            char aTZDirection)
Creates a TimeZone object from a given set of UTC offset information (hours, minutes, and direction).

Parameters:
aTZHours - The offset hours.
aTZMinutes - The offset minutes.
aTZDirection - The offset direction.
Returns:
A new time zone.

getTimezoneOffset

public int getTimezoneOffset()
Gets the timezone offset (in minutes).

getTimezoneOffsetMillis

public int getTimezoneOffsetMillis()
Gets the timezone offset (in milliseconds).

formatTimeZone

protected java.lang.String formatTimeZone()
Formats the current value of TimeZone in schema format. Note that if the timezone offset is found to be 0, that would indicate UTC, in which case this method will return "Z". Examples: +05:00 -07:30 +13:00
